subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Police
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Officers of Italy’s elite NAS police unit searched the RadioShack team’s hotel in Falcade, Italy, on Monday, the rest day for the Giro d’Italia, said Angelo Zomegnan, the race director.
snippet: Officers of Italy’s elite NAS police unit searched the RadioShack team’s hotel in Falcade, Italy, on Monday, the rest day for the Giro d’Italia, said Angelo Zomegnan, the race director.
